short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reverses the order of names in the participants list in Google Meets!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A lightweight extension for putting the names in the Google Meets participants list into "Last Name, First Name" format. Meant to be utilized by teachers taking attendance for online classes.
Inspired by Ms. Boatright at Mountain Pointe High School.

Version 1.3
- Extension now sorts the user list by last names

Version 1.2
- Added new document selector system (thank you to Rick Duncan for the contribution!)
- Fixed for the latest version of Google Meets

Version 1.1
- Now updates peoples names with their reversed name as they come into the call
- Fixed a small bug with name reversal
